Name: Teleportation Matrix
Description: Teleport to other player, no action this turn

Name: Emergency Signal
Description: sell an equipment card to loot its value +3

Name: Overclocked
Description: sell an equipment card for loot 4

Name: Worm Hole
Description: Teleport to any tile, no action this turn

Name: Chrono Shift
Description: Discard a card to perform +1 action

Name: Adaptive Transform
Description: Discard hand and re-draw the same amount of cards

Name: Nanite Repair Tool
Description: Allow 1 reroll of the dice for an action

Name: Precision
Description: Allow 1 additional roll of the dice for an action, pick 1

Name: Emergency Evac
Description: If within one space of a player, move up to three spaces away from them

Name: System Hack
Description: Force an opponent to discard a random card

Name: Deflector Shield
Description: You cannot be attacked until your next turn

Name: tes1
Description: Use a utility card twice at once
draw 2 cards after successful monster fight
+3 attack if you have a resource in hand
sell an equipment card for a resource up to its value
draw a card, if it is a resource, secure it
+3 Attack, opponent replaces 1 loot choice (before you loot)
+3 Mining, opponent replaces 1 loot choice (before you loot)
+2 loot, if it is an equipment, equip it
